item.title: [PI] 317 Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @Tylerd21 Tylerd21
item.description:
@Tylerd21 wrote:

This event was made when I was bored and for a server I’m no longer going to develop because of personal issues.
If you don’t want it or don’t like it, you don’t have to use it. It’s for people to get ideas or to use it for themselves.
If you want to change anything to your style, go right ahead.

Make this a class file called [B]ChristmasNightmare[/B],
inside src/server/content/quests/

[code]
package server.content.quests;

import server.game.players.Client;

/**

  • Christmas Nightmare.
  • @author Merticual
    */

public class ChristmasNightmare {

public Client client;

public ChristmasNightmare(Client client) {
	this.client = client;
}

public void showInformation() {
	for(int i = 8144; i < 8195; i++) {
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("", i);
	}
	client.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Christmas Nightmare", 8144);
	client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
	if(client.CN == 0) {
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("To start the quest, you should talk Santa", 8147);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("found in the North-East Miscellania Mine.", 8148);
	} else if(client.CN == 1) {
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should talk Santa", 8147);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@found in the North-East Miscellania Mine.", 8148);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Santa has asked you to retrieve the following items:", 8150);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Presents", 8151);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Bobble Hat", 8152);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Bobble Scarf", 8153);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Jester Hat", 8154);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Bobble Scarf", 8155);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Tri-Jester Hat", 8156);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Tri-Jester Scarf", 8157);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Woolly Hat", 8158);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Woolly Scarf", 8159);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("An Ornament", 8160);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Santa also mentioned that one his helpers said that", 8161);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("there's been an imp spotted outside the Varrock Palace.", 8162);
	} else if(client.CN == 2) {
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should talk Santa", 8147);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@found in the North-East Miscellania Mine.", 8148);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Santa has asked you to retrieve the following items:", 8150);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Presents", 8151);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Bobble Hat", 8152);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Bobble Scarf", 8153);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Jester Hat", 8154);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Bobble Scarf", 8155);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Tri-Jester Hat", 8156);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Tri-Jester Scarf", 8157);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Woolly Hat", 8158);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Woolly Scarf", 8159);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@An Ornament", 8160);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Santa also mentioned that one his helpers said that", 8161);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@there's been an imp spotted outside the Varrock Palace.", 8162);
	} else if(client.CN == 3) {
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should talk Santa", 8147);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@found in the North-East Miscellania Mine.", 8148);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Santa has asked you to retrieve the following items:", 8150);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Presents", 8151);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Bobble Hat", 8152);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Bobble Scarf", 8153);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Jester Hat", 8154);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Bobble Scarf", 8155);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Tri-Jester Hat", 8156);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Tri-Jester Scarf", 8157);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Woolly Hat", 8158);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Woolly Scarf", 8159);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@An Ornament", 8160);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@Santa also mentioned that one his helpers said that", 8161);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@there's been an imp spotted outside the Varrock Palace.", 8162);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8163);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("You have completed this quest!", 8164);
		client.getPA().sendFrame126("Santa has rewarded you with a Santa Hat and a Christmas Cracker!", 8165);
	}
	client.getPA().showInterface(8134);
}

}[/code]

Inside [B]Dialoguehandler.java[/B]

/** * Christmas Nightmare. */ case 450: sendNpcChat1("Christmas is done forever!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 451; break; case 451: sendNpcChat1("This is such a nightmare..!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 452; case 452: sendPlayerChat1("What, what's wrong?"); c.nextChat = 453; break; case 453: sendNpcChat2("They're all gone", "everything's gone!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 454; break; case 454: sendPlayerChat1("What's gone?"); c.nextChat = 455; break; case 455: sendNpcChat1("All my Christmas decorations and presents!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 456; break; case 456: sendPlayerChat1("What happened to your stuff..?"); c.nextChat = 457; break; case 457: sendNpcChat2("Stolen!", "it was all stolen!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 458; break; case 458: sendPlayerChat1("By who..?"); c.nextChat = 459; break; case 459: sendNpcChat1("Imps!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 460; break; case 460: sendPlayerChat1("IMPS!?"); c.nextChat = 461; break; case 461: sendNpcChat2("Yes, imps..", "Those little nasty things ambushed me and stole everything!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 462; break; case 462: sendNpcChat2("Hell by now", "Everything's probably thrown all over the globe!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 463; break; case 463: sendNpcChat2("Without those things", "Christmas isn't going to happen this year...", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 464; break; case 464: sendPlayerChat2("Well", "is there anything I could do to help..?"); c.nextChat = 465; break; case 465: sendNpcChat1("You'd help me?!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 466; break; case 466: sendOption2("Of course I would!", "Hah! Sike have a shitty Christmas fatass!"); c.dialogueAction = 101; break; case 467: //accept quest c.CN += 1; c.getPA().loadQuests(); sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much, "+ Misc.capitalize(c.playerName) +"!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 468; break; case 468: sendNpcChat1("Please return my items to me as fast as possible!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 500; break; case 500: sendPlayerChat1("Where you do think these Imps would be located?"); c.nextChat = 501; break; case 501: sendNpcChat2("One of my helpers said there's one", "located outside the palace of Varrock.", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 502; break; case 502: sendPlayerChat2("Thank you for the information,", "I'll try to be as quick as I can!"); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 469://refuse quest sendPlayerChat1("Nope! Cya!"); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 470: sendNpcChat1("How are you getting on with the items?", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 471; break; case 471: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(6542) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6856) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6857) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6858) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6859) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6860) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6861) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6862) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6863) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4432)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6542, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6856, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6857, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6858, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6859, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6860, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6861, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6862, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(6863, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4432, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1050, 1); c.getDH().sendPlayerChat1("Here are your items"); c.CN += 1; c.getPA().loadQuests(); c.nextChat = 472; } else { c.getDH().sendPlayerChat1("I'm still working on it."); c.nextChat = 0; } break; case 472: sendNpcChat2("Thank you so much for the help!", "Christmas is saved because of you!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.CN += 1; c.questPoints += 3; c.getPA().loadQuests(); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 473: sendNpcChat1("Thank you again for saving Christmas!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 0; break;

Inside [B]Clickingbuttons.java[/B]

case 28166: c.getCN().showInformation(); break;

under [B]case 9157:[/B]

if (c.dialogueAction == 101) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(467, 1552); }
under [B]case 9158:[/B]

if (c.dialogueAction == 101) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(469, 1552); }

Inside [B]Clickitem.java[/B]

if(itemId == 2677) { for(int i = 6968; i < 6976; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().sendFrame126("A tower filled with Wizards,", 6971); c.getPA().sendFrame126("inside a town that starts with Y,", 6972); c.getPA().sendFrame126("I find myself hiding inside a crate", 6973); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Behind a building with money.", 6974); c.getPA().showInterface(6965); } if(itemId == 2678) { for(int i = 6968; i < 6976; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cold and as tall as the sky", 6971); c.getPA().sendFrame126("higher than the warriors.", 6972); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Finding myself in the North-West", 6973); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Next to a course for a Skill that", 6974); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Starts with A, kill me for your next clue.", 6975); c.getPA().showInterface(6965); } if(itemId == 2679) { for(int i = 6968; i < 6976; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().sendFrame126("Spooky and scary and dead,", 6971); c.getPA().sendFrame126("containing a house with a vampire", 6972); c.getPA().sendFrame126("inside of it. A fountain along a gate", 6973); c.getPA().sendFrame126("inside my field of trees, contains your", 6974); c.getPA().sendFrame126("next clue. North of Draynor Village.", 6975); c.getPA().showInterface(6965); } if(itemId == 2680) { for(int i = 6968; i < 6976; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().sendFrame126("Inside a tower behind four magic", 6971); c.getPA().sendFrame126("trees. Open a door, and search", 6972); c.getPA().sendFrame126("beyond the room to find me.", 6973); c.getPA().sendFrame126("I'm west of the Legends Guild", 6974); c.getPA().sendFrame126("and south of the Camelot Flax field.", 6975); c.getPA().showInterface(6965); } if(itemId == 2681) { for(int i = 6968; i < 6976; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i); } c.getPA().sendFrame126("I am a powerful spirit, hidden", 6971); c.getPA().sendFrame126("below a trapdoor, in a village.", 6972); c.getPA().sendFrame126("South of your third clue, I am", 6973); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Found. Enter the trapdoor, and", 6974); c.getPA().sendFrame126("defeat me, and you'll save Christmas.", 6975); c.getPA().showInterface(6965); }

inside [B]player.java[/B]
declare

public int CN;

still inside [B]player.java[/B]

public boolean ChristmasArea() { if(absX >= 2508 && absX <= 2625 && absY >= 3830 && absY <= 3930 || (absX >= 2944 && absX <= 2986 && absY >= 3904 && absY <= 3966)) { //Miscellania Coord Box c.getPA().walkableInterface(11877); //Snow Interface return true; } return false; }

public boolean inChristmasArea() { return absX >= 2508 && absX <= 2625 && absY >= 3830 && absY <= 3930 || absX >= 2944 && absX <= 2986 && absY >= 3904 && absY <= 3966; }

inside [B]playersave.java[/B]

} else if (token.equals("ChristmasNightmare")) { p.CN = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("ChristmasNightmare = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.CN), 0, Integer.toString(p.CN).length());

inside [B]client.java[/B],

import server.content.quests.ChristmasNightmare;

} else if(inChristmasArea()) { getPA().walkableInterface(11877);

public ChristmasNightmare getCN() { return christmasNightmare; }

Since my source is old, it’s probably going to be different for a lot of you. But here’s the npc/drops/etc.

If you have it set up [B]config.java[/B], here.

/* NPC/ID/AMOUNT/POSSIBILITY */ //Christmas Imp {708, 6542, 1, 0}, {708, 2677, 1, 0}, //christmas Ice giants {111, 6858, 1, 0}, {111, 6859, 1, 0}, {111, 2679, 1, 0}, //Christmas Spirit {2849, 4432, 1, 0},

Inside spawn-config[B]
[/B]

spawn = 1552 2540 3891 0 1 0 0 0 santa spawn = 708 3221 3449 0 1 0 0 0 Imp spawn = 111 2962 3921 0 1 0 0 0 Ice giant spawn = 111 2961 3917 0 1 0 0 0 Ice giant spawn = 111 2968 3916 0 1 0 0 0 Ice giant spawn = 111 2975 3923 0 1 0 0 0 Ice giant spawn = 125 2970 3913 0 1 0 0 0 Ice Warrior spawn = 125 2968 3918 0 1 0 0 0 Ice Warrior spawn = 125 2961 3915 0 1 0 0 0 Ice Warrior spawn = 2849 3112 9686 0 1 0 0 0 Evil Spirit

Inside [B]playerassistant.java[/B],

if (c.CN == 0) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Christmas Nightmare", 7334); } if (c.CN == 1) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Christmas Nightmare", 7334); } if (c.CN == 2) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Christmas Nightmare", 7334); } if (c.CN == 3) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Christmas Nightmare", 7334); } }

inside[B] actionhandler.java[/B],

case 0: c.getItems().addItem(2678, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6856, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6857, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(2677, 1); c.sendMessage("You've found a Bobble Hat and Scarf!"); break; case 153: c.getItems().addItem(6860, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6861, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2680, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(2679, 1); c.sendMessage("You reach your hand into the fountain."); c.sendMessage("Slowly pulling out a wet Tri-Jester Hat and Scarf."); break; case 357: c.getItems().addItem(6862, 1); c.getItems().addItem(6863, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2681, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(2680, 1); c.sendMessage("You reach into the crate."); c.sendMessage("and pull out a Woolly Hat and Scarf!"); break;

case 1552: if(c.CN == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(450, npcType); } else if(c.CN == 1) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(470, npcType); } else if(c.CN == 2) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(472, npcType); } else if(c.CN == 3) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(473, npcType); } break;

inside [B]Clickobject.java[/B],

case 153: c.objectDistance = 2; break;

inside [B]objectmanager.java[/B],

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(0, 2618, 3093, 1, 10);

If I missed anything, tell me and I’ll add the rest of the code in, if you use this. Please leave a thanks, otherwise, enjoy.

I’m not helping with any errors or telling where things go, sorry.

Read full topic
